Plot: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that the film is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.
Title: Treasure Planet
Writer: Robert Louis Stevenson (novel), Ron Clements (screenplay), John Musker (screenplay), Rob Edwards (screenplay), Ron Clements (animation story), John Musker (animation story), Ted Elliott (animation story), Terry Rossio (animation story)
Actors: Roscoe Lee Browne, Corey Burton, Dane A. Davis, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
tomatoConsensus: Though its characterizations are weaker than usual, Treasure Planet offers a fast-paced, beautifully rendered vision of outer space.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 13 nominations.
